DOC.brief_title: The Physical Activity Loyalty Card Scheme
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator develop Physical Activity Loyalty Card ( PAL ) Scheme integrate novel physical activity track system web-based monitoring nudge initiative . The tracking system use Near-Field Communication ( NFC ) technology `` loyalty card '' ( PAL Card ) contain passive Radio Frequency Identification ( RFID ) tag . Sensors place along footpaths outdoor environment , gym exercise studio , participant scan PAL card sensor physical activity ( e.g . walk ) . A transaction ( card ID , sensor ID , timestamp ) record sent via SMS secure data centre . Participants log onto personal account study website ( www.palcard.co.uk ) receive real-time feedback various aspect physical activity include minute , distance calorie expend .
